sense.name: Have sovereign power (over something or someone).
sense.examples: President Carlos Salinas de Gortari reigned for 28 years. May the Queen reign forever! I reign over my home office like a king.

sense.name: Be larger in number, quantity, power, status, or importance, without personally having sovereign power.
sense.examples: Money reigns supreme here. Hispanics reign as the largest population in the city. The Blue Whale reigns as the biggest animal on Earth.
